Deep Research.description: Single-argument Deep Research tool that accepts a topic string and returns a report plus message trace.

topic.description: Describe the subject you want fully researched.

Cerebras GitHub Researcher.description: Cerebras-powered ULTRA-FAST deep researcher with GitHub MCP and FireCrawl SDK. Uses Cerebras GLM-4.6 for blazing fast inference with 2M context window for investigating bugs and code.

Cerebras Firecrawl Researcher.description: Deep research agent using Cerebras AI for ultra-fast inference and Firecrawl SDK for comprehensive web scraping. Includes search, scrape, crawl, map, and extract tools.

Cerebras BrightData Researcher.description: Deep research agent using Cerebras AI for ultra-fast inference and BrightData SDK for enterprise-grade web data collection. Includes Google/Bing search, scraping with anti-bot bypass, crawling, AI extraction, and LinkedIn search.
